title: "Fool Your Maneuvers" - A Guide to Fighters
itunes:title: "Fool Your Maneuvers" - A Guide to Fighters
description:
This week Jasper and Jeremy surge into action with a synchronized deep-dive into the fighter class. Get ready to hone your skills and sharpen your sword, or arrows, or axe, or spear, or dagger, or well, fighters can use just about anything. ANYWAY, grab your weapons and let round one begin, FIGHT! (ER)

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including Campfire Chats where we dive into each episode of Outlaws & Obelisks.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com
